: : Kup : :
Kup took notice of the battle around him.

Kup: Damn, the Predacons got here first.

Kup draws his plasma rifle from subspace and takes some cover where Convoy was. Kup opens fire, releasing three shots on the closest Predacon.


dishpanhandninja <foxmanroar1@...> wrote:Rave Motioned to the new comer. "Get Down Man!" "Theres a battle 
going on here!"

WingRazor the BeastMachine Eagle fought Phenoix as NightViper 
defended Starstorm, and convoy held up to other preds...
